the grammar is very simple:

Nouns are often written the same way as verbs and adjectives,
with the same Terminus symbols and Determinants

There is very little conjugation and declination, only dual and plural for nouns.

𓏤 -ein -one -ing -eines -ness -mas -os

-𓏌𓅱𓏏𓂻 ?

𓋴𓐪𓂧 sail
𓋴𓐪𓂧𓏌𓅱𓏏𓂻 sailing

𓎡 𓏏 𓏏 𓅪 cute/petit
𓎡 𓏏 𓏤 𓅪 pettiness

sometimes there is an 'abstract maker' 𓃀𓍢𓇩 buch to turn adjectives into verbs nouns

𓃀𓍢 being-

  1. 𓄤 nefer schön=fair
  2. 𓃀𓍢𓄤 bein'fair = beauty

ⲣⲉϥ- prefix run -> ⲣⲉϥϭⲟϫⲓ runner ⲙⲁⲛ- prefix run -> ⲙⲁⲛϭⲟϫⲓ place of running ϫⲓⲛ- prefix run -> ϫⲓⲛϭⲟϫⲓ running
